General.Name: WindSun Science & Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: WindSun Science&Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of power electronic energy-saving control technology and related products in China. The company offers high-voltage dynamic reactive power compensation devices; high, medium, and low voltage frequency converters; smart energy storage system devices; rail transit energy feedback devices; coal mine explosion-proof devices; and intelligent control equipment. Its products used in various applications, such as new energy power generation, urban rail transit, metallurgy, electric power, mining, petroleum, chemical, and other fields. WindSun Science&Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jinan, China.
General.Address: North of the Middle Section Jincheng Rd, Jinan, China, 272500
